thread.section_title: The 2 Week Diet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The 2 Week Diet | www.2weekdiet.com
thread.title: Will Bartlett
thread.title_full: The 2 Week Diet reviewed by Will Bartlett

author: Will Bartlett
title: Will Bartlett
text: I have spent a lot of time looking around for the best way to lose my gut (part of a New Year's Resolution) and this book is the solution. It structured well so you can skip around to the parts you need to constantly review, and emphasizes the willpower aspect, which is what made the biggest difference for me. Loved the book and will recommend to my friends in the future.
